Agree.
Sent:06/05/2024 at 10:34 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/05/2024 at 10:35 AM)
Subject:Re: Too Hot
Message 3021 of 4024
We are talking about two different events.
I canceled Rancho as it was too late to go
You canceled Lands End booked a year in advance
If you are not, my travel agent quit canceling my freaking rooms.
Sent:06/05/2024 at 10:35 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/05/2024 at 02:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Missing 10k
Message 3022 of 4024
You never get it. Everything is transactional for you. It’s more than the investigation. I’m talking about the well-fair of our kids and keeping that part
of them safe. So they can love and appreciate who they are, not feel shame. I’m trying to approach this in a holistic way where we can honor our past
and not trash each other and that includes friends and family.
Your response is always that it’s time to tell the truth. You’re tired of lying to people. I’m pretty sure that it’s up to you what you tell them about our
past just as it is for me. I’ve been mum on all the things that we did. At the time we did them because we liked it. You, by contrast have started an
advertising campaign of destruction and defamation.
So I’m asking if can we agree to stop doing that and work on honoring the years we spent together. If you don’t understand, please take some time off
work and educate yourself. It’s not a knock, you just don’t  know. So I’m asking you to learn how your vengeful flamethrower approach is impacting
the kids.
Frankly, I’m tired of having this discussion. All our messaging platforms are replete with examples of me, trying to get this under control and not treat
each other in horrible, thoughtless, and inhumane ways that screw up our kids for the rest of their lives. I’m actually tired of trying to convince you to
parent responsibly. It’s clear you don’t get it.
Sent:06/05/2024 at 10:45 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/05/2024 at 02:02 PM)
Subject:Re: I am not fighting , let’s cool off , ok?
Message 3023 of 4024
Well, it’s unfortunate that this was the last mail you answered. Either way, I’m stopping now. Flame away
Sent:06/05/2024 at 10:47 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/05/2024 at 02:03 PM)
Subject:Re: Too Hot
